answers.answer: Some believe the antibiotics will kill them, some think they're still helpful.  You must finish the antibiotic course once you start to avoid creating a resistant strain.  If you're having stomach problems, you might try a probiotic with bifidus in it.  You can also try ginger, chamomile,  homeopathic remedies such as nux vomica, aloe juice and the like for the stomach problems.  Good luck.
